attributes.action: Make one off payment bonus paid by employers for cost of living tax free
attributes.additional_details: With the cost of living crisis, employers are paying a one off bonus to employees to help with the additional cost. The government should make this payment tax free

rejection.details:
We are not sure what action you would like the Government to take. All bonuses are treated equally under the tax system. 

You could start a new petition call for bonuses, or bonuses of certain amounts or to people earning certain amounts, be tax free, if this is something you would like to see happen.
